Banner.Description: I am a UI/UX Designer with 1 year of experience in designing user-friendly, responsive, and visually appealing web and mobile interfaces. I have worked on diverse projects including educational websites and company websites using Figma. My designs focus on enhancing user experience, ensuring mobile-first responsiveness, and building interfaces that align with business goals. I specialize in creating interactive prototypes, wireframes, and high-fidelity mockups to deliver intuitive, modern design solutions.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Coming from a Bachelor's in Computer Applications (BCA) background, I discovered my true interest in crafting user-friendly and visually engaging digital experiences. Given my strong skill for design and problem-solving, I choose to specialize in UI/UX design. Since then, I've been committed to developing user-friendly interfaces that improve user experiences on mobile and web platforms.

Over the past year, I've developed practical experience with Figma to create accessible and responsive designs. My work has included corporate portfolios, e-commerce platforms, and websites for educational consulting. I have concentrated on improving usability, ensuring mobile-first responsiveness, and translating business needs into practical, intuitive design solutions.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: UI/UX Designer
Description: Collaborated with developers to understand project requirements and translate user needs into effective design solutions.
Created wireframes, prototypes, and user flows using Figma to support both web and mobile application development.
Designed responsive and user-friendly interfaces for landing pages, dashboards, and client websites, ensuring a seamless experience across devices.
Assisted in transforming complex requirements into clean, accessible, and intuitive visual designs.
Participated in team and client meetings to gather feedback, refine design concepts, and align with project goals.
Ensured visual design consistency, accessibility, and mobile responsiveness across all projects.

Experience.Jobs.Title: UI/UX Intern
Description: Collaborated with senior designers and developers to understand project requirements and user needs.
Created wireframes, prototypes, and user flows using Figma to support web and mobile application development.
Designed responsive and user-friendly interfaces for landing pages, and client websites.
Assisted in translating complex ideas into clean, accessible, and intuitive designs.
Participated in  meetings to gather feedback and refine design solutions based on project goals.
Worked alongside the development team to support the smooth handoff of design assets and provide ongoing UI/UX support during implementation.

FeatureProjects.Title: Project that is Designed by me.
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Saral Apps
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Saral Apps Pvt Ltd is a technology solutions provider specializing in custom digital experiences, with a strong focus on developing eLearning platforms.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Saral Discount
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Saral discount is a platform designed to revolutionize how employees access exclusive discounts and perks. We connect companies directly with merchants, making it simple and convenient for employees to enjoy corporate discounts.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lex Nepal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Lex Nepal Institute of Law is dedicated to building a strong foundation for your legal career. We go beyond exam preparation and focus on real-world legal training.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tejilo
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Discover a world of knowledge with our E-Learning Platform! Explore interactive courses, engage with expert instructors, and unlock your potential from anywhere. Join us on a journey of seamless online learning

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Aide Ascent
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: We build cutting-edge software solutions, empowering businesses to scale, innovate, and thrive in the digital era.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hotel Reservation
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A web-based application designed to simplify the process of booking hotel rooms for users and managing reservations for hotel staff.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: JobNepal
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A job portal platform designed to connect job seekers with employers across Nepal. The platform allows users to create profiles, upload CVs, and apply for relevant job opportunities.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
